page.title: 19LOCAL/PRIVATE EDUCATION.
page.content: In this area,there are only two schools,both in{LANGTON.}The{PRIMARY {SCHOOL}takes children from around the area up to the age of 11.It has about 50-55 children on the roll,taught by 1 part-time and 2 full-time teachers. They work from 9.00 until 3.30pm,with a break for lunch.They go to school every week day on a school bus,which also takes older children on to{NORTON {COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL. { WOODLEIGH SCHOOL}is an{INDEPENDENT {PREPARATORY SCHOOL}for 8-13yr.old boys and girls.Most children board but some travel in daily.They breakfast at 7.50 and begin working at 8.40.They have 'Games every day after lunch,with two more lessons from 4.00-5.10,tea-time. All except the Ist.Form then do "Prep" at 7.00pm,after which they go to bed. They go on to{PUBLIC SCHOOLS,}like {SEDBERGH,AMPLEFORTH}and{POCKLINGTON.
